main event: A UFO was observed by a military pilot while on a mission in the Still Tiger areas of South Laos.
interesting points: The UFO was observed at a relative bearing of roughly 120 to 130 degrees and at 45 degrees above the horizon., The observation lasted for 2-3 seconds as the object passed over the aircraft on a northeasterly course., The pilot initially thought it was a big comet, but it appeared to be under intelligent control., The object left a tail of gaseous residue described as bright green, and generated a rushing sound similar to an afterburner., Captain R.C. Deyst, another pilot, reported similar observations of the same or similar object in the area before.
sighted object: UFO, initially thought to be a comet
location: Still Tiger areas of South Laos
witness description: Major GA Sewul 05167 of VMFA 7314 piloting an F4F
